attributes.action: Extend driving theory tests in the UK due to Coronavirus
attributes.additional_details: The majority of people on the roads did not have to sit a theory test as they did not come into action until 1996, therefore students should be allowed to have an extension for these very particular circumstances.
attributes.background: Extend theory tests in the UK as students were not able to take their practical driving test from March - July and now will not be able to take it all through November. There has also been a huge back log of driving tests so students have not been able to book a driving test until 3+ months
